About Me

Let me tell you a few things..

BIO

Full Stack Developer

42 Silicon Valley Software Engineer. Studied C with C11 conformance for Unix Development. I love to learn new technologies everyday! My experience is with C, C++, Javascript, Java, Docker, and all the JS frameworks!

Kift

Voice User Interface App

Created Kift, a trained VUI application that responds to user requests (checking weather or traffic, setting a timer, etc.)

Wolf3D

WolfStein Remake

Created a Wolf3D remake of the original fps game in the C Language An amazing project in which I learned the intricacies of C and raycasting.

Java Flight Simulator

Full Stack Developer

Created avaj-launcher, an aircraft flight path simulator in various weather patterns using Java 8 modeled with UML.
